page.title: 16Events in Eccleshall
page.content: Eccleshall's most important annual event is the{Horticultural Show and {Gymkhana,}held in August. A hard- working committee organizes the gym- khana and marquees for the competitive exhibitions of vegetables, fruit, flowers and craft-work. Stallholders raise money for favourite charities and entertainment is provided by a funfair, Morris dancing, and a disco. Regular get-togethers for townspeople are provided by coffee mornings, jumble sales and the recently innovat- ed car-boot sales. A summer{Victorian {street market,}held biennially, attracts growing numbers of visitors and provides an opportunity for fancy dress and general fun. In 1985, to commemorate 40 years of peace, a fascinating display was mounted in Holy Trinity church, and local sports clubs held lively internal matches.
